Html:
hi,
First, I apologize for my English.
I'll be right down to it. I should make to reproduce the audio tracks on different sound cards with a single player.
I asked myself if it was possible, and if you can get some advice about it.

Many thanks,
Pstariell
Not easily I'm afraid. The easiest way would be to just play the same thing out of both soundcards separately. However, you will struggle to get perfect syncrhonization
